title: Add --cwd CLI parameter
description: CLI must accept --cwd parameter to specify working directory for Ralph execution. Defaults to process.cwd().
steps: Add --cwd yargs option with string type and process.cwd() default

title: Thread cwd through server initialization
description: Server stack must receive and propagate cwd from CLI through all layers to Ralph service.

title: Remove workingDirectory from Ralph API
description: Ralph service must use cwd from constructor instead of per-request workingDirectory parameter.
steps: Store cwd in closure for start() method
Remove workingDirectory parameter from start() method
Update start() to use stored cwd
Change ralph.start input to empty object

title: Remove working directory modal from UI
description: UI must not prompt for working directory. Start Ralph directly when clicked.
steps: Update handleStartRalph to call mutation without parameter
Update StartRalphButton onStart to call handleStartRalph directly
